articles.author: Marley Malenfant
articles.title: Texas vs Ohio State: Date, time, TV channel and how to watch - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Texas will kick off its season on Saturday, Aug. 30, 2025, on the road at Ohio State, in Columbus.

articles.title: Genetically, Central American mammoths were weird - Ars Technica
articles.description: The species’s boundaries in North America seem to have been fairly fluid.
